name: Flare_smart_contracts
description: Smart contracts implementing FTSO and FAsset on flare network.
author: Flare SC team

scripts.testHH: yarn testUnitHH && yarn testIntegrationHH && yarn testPerformanceHH
scripts.testUnitHH: env TEST_PATH=./test/unit yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.testIntegrationHH: env TEST_PATH=./test/integration yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.testSystemSCDev: env TEST_PATH=./test/scdev/system yarn hardhat test --network scdev
scripts.testPerformanceHH: env TEST_PATH=./test/performance yarn hardhat test --network hardhat
scripts.testTimeShift: env VM_FLARE_TEST=shift yarn hardhat test --network develop
scripts.testTimeWait: env VM_FLARE_TEST=real yarn hardhat test --network develop
scripts.testDeploySCDev: yarn compile && x=$(yarn --silent hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.ts --network scdev) && echo $x > deploys/scdev.json && yarn testSCDev
scripts.testSCDev: cat deploys/scdev.json | yarn hardhat test --network scdev ./test/scdev/deploy/deploy.ts
scripts.testDeployFtsoMvp: yarn compile && x=$(yarn --silent hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.ts --network ftsomvp) && echo $x > deploys/ftsomvp.json && yarn testFtsoMvp
scripts.testFtsoMvp: cat deploys/scdev.json | yarn hardhat test --network ftsomvp ./test/scdev/deploy/deploy.ts
scripts.testDeployCostonSCTeam: yarn compile && x=$(yarn --silent hardhat run ./scripts/deploy.ts --network costonSCTeam) && echo $x > deploys/costonSCTeam.json
scripts.testCostonSCTeam: cat deploys/costonSCTeam.json | yarn hardhat test --network costonSCTeam ./test/scdev/deploy/deploy.ts
scripts.compile: yarn hardhat compile && yarn typechain-ethers-v5 && yarn typechain-truffle-v5
